title: Need the 3.5 version of the Framework...where do I get this?
ques:
Hey People,

Great work guys. A friend of mine had purchased your product and I had chance to work with it.  It was SUPERB!.... 
Anyway, I would want to purchase it too, but would require the 3.5 version of it. How can I get this?

answers.ans:
Hi,

When you login to dofactory forum, you can see  'products ' section on the left side. Just click on products and pricing link or design pattern framework link.

I think Dan knows this best, but after I purchased the design pattern framework and I login to my account I can download the latest as well as the older versions of the framework.

Just take a look under my account and click the download here link and you should be presented with download links for version from 1.1 up to 4.0.

Hope that helps.

When you purchase the Design Pattern Framework 4.0, you'll also get access to prior versions, that is, .NET 3.5, .NET 2.0 and .NET 1.1.  In each version, the underlying principles of the Design Patterns has not changed, but their implementations and where they are used does change. 

Hope this helps.
Thanks guys.........Im off to get my very own .NET Framework license
